meanings.definition: To change the color of something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys recoloring her drawings with bright markers.
meanings.sent2: The artist is recoloring the walls of the gallery to match the new theme.
meanings.sent3: After recoloring her hair purple, she realized it clashed with her green dress.
meanings.sent4: The sunset recoloring the sky in shades of pink and orange was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: Recoloring the garden fence in a vibrant blue made the whole yard look more cheerful.

meanings.definition: The act of altering the color of an object.
meanings.sent1: The recoloring of the car's exterior gave it a fresh new look.
meanings.sent2: She specialized in recoloring old photographs to bring them back to life.
meanings.sent3: The recoloring of the classroom walls in rainbow hues made the students smile.
meanings.sent4: The recoloring of the logo brought a modern twist to the company's image.
meanings.sent5: The recoloring of the dress from white to blue transformed its appearance completely.
